name: Flappy Bee (itch)
description:
You click to flap and to respawn.

Ludum Dare game. It's...that one game...with a Bee?? In a small world?

The fun part of this short dare was learning how to make music and trying pixel art for the first time! I apologize for the badness already.

Comes with the pixel art and the music, should anyone ACTUALLY want that.
